title: League of legends is a balanced game.
body:
Hi guys.  Im a representative from riot.  Here at riot games we understand the concern for tanks not being able to deal as much damage as carries back in season 2.  So we decided to Make everyone do as much damage as carries by implementing **Percent health damage** In kits!  
We want every player to realize the more tanks you have that deal percent hp damage, the higher rank you will receive.  Also we have decided udyr is jesus, so on top of being completely unkillable he will have the best burst in the game AND be the fastest  
Dont forget, if you are not playing vayne bot lane, you are not playing the game right

replies.body: Vayne isn't even strong.Also adcs are op right now.13-14 adcs are viable and 6 adcs are so strong.
100% true. Assassins don't need buffs; most need nerfs (NOT rengar). ADCs need to be nerfed (But that'll never happen: Rito needs Gosu and all the other "Best ADC NA"s to make them money.)
Theres a video of imaqtpie creaming Gosu in a 1 v 1 somewhere. I honestly dont think hes that good for the amount of practice he gets.
Wrong, Vayne is actually pretty good right now, the problem is she needs to get fed or make it to late game without her team taking too much damage.
That description does not suggest her being "pretty good."  It's long been known that she is strong in the late game, but she generally gets destroyed in the early game.
Leblanc, katarina, are two champions I can think of who can assassinate a vayne easy.
Udyr is bad against meta tanks.
Its actually funny that you find him strong. You must be stuck in the depths of bronze. When you get out you will have the right to talk in the gameplay section.
I love this sarcastic post, please do more
